template<typename A, typename F, typename Q, typename E>
void Arageli::skeleton (A &a, F &f, Q &q, E &e)
 The algorithm for double-description of a polyhedal cone.

Detailed Description

Algorithms for double-description of a convex polyhedron. Implementation of skeleton function. Now this function just calls skeleton_motzkin_burger function.
